name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SupaBird - Grow Your Twitter With Auto Likes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Like posts on Twitter automatically, schedule daily auto likes and watch your followers grow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SupaBird helps you grow organically on X/Twitter by automatically liking posts of other people.

Here is how it works:
1. You search Twitter/X by some hashtag (let's say #buildinpublic)
2 You open SupaBird and click "start liking"
3. SupaBird will automatically like posts in that search
4. People will get notified that you liked their posts
5. They will check your account and follow you

This strategy can help you get 100-300 quality followers every month. It very much depends on how good your profile is.

You like a limited number of posts for free. Then you can upgrade for a very low price.
